meanings.definition: The territory or jurisdiction of a marquis.
meanings.sent1: The marquisates were vast lands ruled by the marquis.
meanings.sent2: The marquisates were divided into smaller regions for better governance.
meanings.sent3: The marquisates had a picnic in the meadow to discuss important matters.
meanings.sent4: The marquisates stood as a shield against external threats.
meanings.sent5: The marquisates sparkled under the golden sun, a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The rank or title of a marquis.
meanings.sent1: The marquisates bestowed honor and respect upon the nobleman.
meanings.sent2: The marquisates were inherited by the eldest son in the family.
meanings.sent3: The marquisates threw a grand ball to celebrate the new title.
meanings.sent4: The marquisates shone brightly in the realm of nobility.
meanings.sent5: The marquisates symbolized power and authority in the kingdom.

meanings.sent1: The marquisates gathered to discuss important matters affecting the realm.
meanings.sent2: The marquisates were known for their wisdom and leadership.
meanings.sent3: The marquisates organized a charity event to help the less fortunate.
meanings.sent4: The marquisates stood united in times of crisis.
meanings.sent5: The marquisates inspired loyalty and camaraderie among the noblemen.
